name: Front Profile Builder
author: UpScaleThought

sections.description:
“Front Profile Builder” plugin is a custom profile builder in front end.
its gives custom form and functionality for login, registration, edit profile, lost password, reset password, remember me and other front end options for wp users.

Your Customers will be able to:

KEY BENEFITS:

  • create custom login page.
  • Registration page.
  • edit profile of logged in user.
  • remember me options in login.
  • lost password link and get password reset link in email.
  • password reset form.

Get more features and full technical support with our pro verison
Front Profile Builder also comes with a premium paid version. Upgrade to Front Profile Builder Pro.

FEATURES:

  • Enables wp user custom login, registration,password lost link and reset option.
  • shortcodes for front-end custom forms.
  • No need to login in admin. user can manage their profile and other activity from frontend.
  • All related pages are automatically created and corresponding shortcodes are copied.you just need to add pages in menu.

This plugin is compatible and tested up to WordPress Version: 4.4
sections.installation:
1) Copy/Upload ‘gen-frontprofile-builder’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
2) Activate ‘Front Profile Builder’ from wp plugin option in admin area
3) Plugin will appear in the menu bar of WP Dashboard
4) Shortcode for Login page: [frontpb_profilebuilder_login]
5) Shortcode for Registration page: [frontpb_profilebuilder_registration]
6) Shortcode for Edit profile page: [frontpb_profilebuilder_editprofile]
7) Shortcode for Lost password page: [frontpb_password_lost]
8) Shortcode for Reset password page: [frontpb_password_reset]
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

1) Copy/Upload ‘gen-frontprofile-builder’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory
2) Activate ‘Front Profile Builder’ from wp plugin option in admin area
3) Plugin will appear in the menu bar of WP Dashboard
4) Shortcode for Login page: [frontpb_profilebuilder_login]
5) Shortcode for Registration page: [frontpb_profilebuilder_registration]
6) Shortcode for Edit profile page: [frontpb_profilebuilder_editprofile]
7) Shortcode for Lost password page: [frontpb_password_lost]
8) Shortcode for Reset password page: [frontpb_password_reset]

1.1

First version of “Front Profile Builder” . No errors known.
